question: Manipur government declared this village as the Biodiversity Heritage Site of the state.
explanation: The Manipur government has declared Dailong village of Tamenglong district as a Biodiversity Heritage Site of the state. It was issued by joint secretary of forest and environment, Kengoo Zuringla. Dialong village, covering an area of 11.35 sq km, has been declared as Biodiversity Heritage Site under Section 37(1) of Biological Diversity Act, 2002.
